Get legal bases data

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
rfrnd_types.Rd

Downloads the legal bases data from the Referendum Database (RDB). See the codebook for a detailed description of all variables.

Usage

rfrnd_types(
  connection = connect(),
  disconnect = TRUE,
  use_cache = TRUE,
  max_cache_age = "1 week"
)

Arguments

connection

Database connection to a PostgreSQL DBMS as returned by connect(). An S4 object that inherits from DBI::DBIConnection.

disconnect

Whether or not to terminate the database connection when finished.

use_cache

Whether or not to return cached results if possible. If FALSE, results are always newly fetched regardless of max_cache_age.

max_cache_age

Duration after which cached results are refreshed (i.e. newly fetched). A valid lubridate duration. Use Inf to disable cache expiry. Only relevant if use_cache = TRUE.

Value

A tibble.

See also

Other data functions: assert_vars(), delete_rfrnds(), download_file_attachments(), read_tbl(), rfrnds(), rfrnds_old(), validate_rfrnds()

Examples

# get all legal bases
rdb::rfrnd_types()
#> # A tibble: 13 × 12
